text:
F. H. LaGUARDIA, Mayor
M. S. NOVIK, Director
CITY OF NEW YORK
ADDRESS ALL
COMMUNICATIONS
TO THE DIRECTOR
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING * II.Y. 7
WORTH 2-5600
WNYC
October 25, 1943
Mr. Frank £. Schooley
Executive Secretary
The National Assn.of Educational Broadcasters
Station WILL
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Regarding the exhibit and expenditure for
the November 28th Conference in Chicago, I certainly would
say, HyesM. The idea is good and if we can cave some of
the money, Q.K., but if $50 is the minimum, I think we ought
to do it.
Best regards
Very sincerely yours
Director
MSN:sd
168
‘New York City’s Own Station”—830 Kc.
